title: EditProjectArgs
description: Schema for edit_project tool arguments. Edits project metadata and configuration including code path and memories path.

code_path.description: Code directory path (use ~ for home). Required for editing.

memories_path.description: Memories directory path. Options: 'DEFAULT' (${default_memories_location}/${name}), 'CODE' (${code_path}/docs), or absolute path. Defaults to 'DEFAULT' when not specified, except auto-updates to new code_path/docs if was ${old_code_path}/docs.
